Game - Class in be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle
The class implements the behavior of the Spectrangle game (a modified two players version with skip and penalities)
Game(Board, Player, Player) - Constructor for class be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle.Game
Construct a game with default settings (Game.DEFAULT_TIMEOUT, Game.DEFAULT_NUMBER_OF_WINNING_ROUNDS, Game.DEFAULT_SKIP_LIMIT, and Game.DEFAULT_SKIP_PENALTY)
Game(Board, Player, Player, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle.Game
Construct a game with custom settings
GameAdapter - Class in be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle.event
An abstract adapter class for receiving game events.
GameAdapter() - Constructor for class be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle.event.GameAdapter
 
GameEvent - Class in be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle.event
This event is used to notify interested parties that the game state is changed during a Game.
GameEvent(Game, Player, Player) - Constructor for class be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle.event.GameEvent
Constructor that does not define a winner (GameEvent.NO_WINNER), designed for begin events.
GameEvent(Game, Player, Player, Player) - Constructor for class be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle.event.GameEvent
Constructor requires a winner (GameEvent.NO_WINNER), designed for end events.
GameListener - Interface in be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle.event
The listener interface for receiving "interesting" game events (begin, and end) during a game.
